author: andrey
msg: CAY-1312 Allow lifecycle callbacks on ROP client. Only method invokes, i.e. no configuration for those callbacks yet

author: isabel
msg: Added Robin to list of developers.

author: lektran
msg: There is currently no way of determining what glAccountTypeId should be used when a CostComponent has been created based on a FixedAsset's FixedAssetStdCost records, hard-coding it as OPERATING_EXPENSE until that is resolved.
Prior to this all Fixed Asset derived CostComponent GL entries were ending up in the error journal.

author: chirino
msg: - reorganized packages syscall will now hold a high level (easier to use) java API to the system calls exposed in the syscall.jni package.

author: isabel
msg: MAHOUT-200 - updated web site and fixed typo in release announcement.
